root.name: Chessmaster Live
root.description: Chessmaster Live successfully brings the Chessmaster franchise to the Xbox Live Arcade platform. It makes excellent use of Xbox live and provides traditional Elo rankings. Included with this basic chess game are four variants of chess. Dark chess, Progressive chess, Losing chess, and Elimination chess are all included but seem difficult to find ranked matches for. Classic chess holds a steady pool of ranked matches all the way through the mid 2000 Elo rankings.Â
